caseStudies.title: TendaNow
caseStudies.summary: AI-powered accountability platform currently in beta testing phase with MVP ready. WhatsApp integration and cultural localization in English, Swahili, and Sheng designed to make goal achievement 10x more affordable for African users. Onboarding phase launching soon.
caseStudies.challenge: Users struggle with goal completion and long-term retention due to lack of accessible, culturally-relevant accountability support. Traditional solutions are expensive and not adapted for African markets. The need for a scalable, affordable platform that understands local contexts is critical.
caseStudies.solution: Developed an AI-powered behavioral transformation platform with WhatsApp-first architecture, personalized AI coaching, and multilingual support (English, Swahili, Sheng). Currently in beta testing phase with MVP complete, validating core features including cultural localization, user engagement patterns, and AI coaching effectiveness before full onboarding launch.
impact: MVP successfully built and in beta testing
Ready for onboarding phase and user expansion

testimonial.quote: TendaNow's beta experience shows tremendous potential. The AI coaching feels natural and the cultural localization makes it genuinely relevant to our market.
testimonial.author: Jane Kariuki

caseStudies.title: CodeCrusher
caseStudies.summary: Enterprise-grade AI assistant automating intelligent code injections, reviews, and augmentations with multi-model inference, fallback logic, and real-time feedback loops.
caseStudies.challenge: Development teams faced slow code review cycles, quality inconsistencies, and difficulty maintaining code standards across large projects. Manual reviews were time-consuming and error-prone.
caseStudies.solution: Developed CodeCrusher with multi-model AI inference, intelligent code injection, automated reviews, and real-time analytics dashboard. Integrated model switching and fallback logic for reliability.
impact: Real-time analytics dashboard with model switching

testimonial.quote: CodeCrusher cut our code review time in half while improving quality. It's a game-changer for our development workflow.
testimonial.author: Alex Chen

caseStudies.title: BizGen
caseStudies.summary: 3-tier hybrid AI platform generating, validating, and localizing business ideas for the African market using predictive modeling and crowdsourced insights.
caseStudies.challenge: Aspiring entrepreneurs in Africa lacked data-driven tools to validate business ideas. Existing solutions were expensive, not localized, and didn't account for regional market dynamics.
caseStudies.solution: Created BizGen with predictive modeling, multilingual personalization (English, Swahili, Sheng), and crowdsourced insights. Integrated onboarding bot and revenue modeling for viable venture guidance.
impact: Predictive revenue modeling and opportunity mapping

testimonial.quote: BizGen helped us validate our business idea with data-driven insights. It's exactly what African entrepreneurs need.
testimonial.author: Amara Okonkwo
